test_focus: Brand Audit API Test - Claude Timeout Fix
description: Re-test the Brand Audit API /api/brand-audit after fixing the Claude timeout issue

fix_details.issue: Claude model was hanging/timing out in fallback chain
fix_details.solution: Removed Claude from fallback chain, now using OpenAI only: gpt-4o-mini → gpt-4o → gpt-4.1
fix_details.timeout_fix: Added 120-second timeout per model to prevent hanging

verification_points: API returns successful response (200 OK, not timeout)
Response contains dimensions (array of 8 brand dimensions)
Backend logs show OpenAI model usage without Claude hanging

results.details: Request timed out after 180 seconds - Claude fix may not be working
